meanings.definition: To pull or drag with effort or force.
meanings.sent1: She hauls the heavy bag up the stairs.
meanings.sent2: The workers haul the fishing nets out of the water.
meanings.sent3: The little dog hauls the oversized bone across the yard.
meanings.sent4: He hauls his tired body out of bed every morning.
meanings.sent5: The determined ant hauls the food back to its nest.

meanings.definition: A quantity of something that has been stolen or is illegal.
A journey made by a vehicle to transport goods.
